languages.text: "Еще раз? Боюсь, они уже все сказали и смиренно ожидают своей участи. Свои вопросы вы можете задать мне".

traits.locale_text: "Еще раз? Боюсь, они уже все сказали и смиренно ожидают своей участи. Свои вопросы вы можете задать мне".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."
languages.original_text: "Еще раз? Боюсь, они уже все сказали и смиренно ожидают своей участи. Свои вопросы вы можете задать мне".

traits.locale_text: "That is thoroughly unnecessary. They have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Any questions you have, you can ask me."
"That is thoroughly unnecessary. They have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Any questions you have, you can ask me."
"That is entirely unnecessary. They have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."
"That is entirely unnecessary. They have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."
"Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."
"Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

languages.text: "Noch einmal? Ich fürchte, sie haben bereits alles gesagt, was sie zu sagen hatten, und erwarten nun demütig ihr Schicksal. Ihr könnt alle weiteren Fragen an mich richten."
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: "Noch einmal? Ich fürchte, sie haben bereits alles gesagt, was sie zu sagen hatten, und erwarten nun demütig ihr Schicksal. Ihr könnt alle weiteren Fragen an mich richten."

languages.text: « Encore ? Ils ont déjà présenté leurs arguments et attendent maintenant que leur sort soit décidé. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez me les poser. »
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: « Encore ? Ils ont déjà présenté leurs arguments et attendent maintenant que leur sort soit décidé. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez me les poser. »

languages.text: “您想再听一次吗？他们该说的话已经说完了，目前正在谦卑地等待命运的安排。如果您有什么问题的话，随时都可以问我。”
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: “您想再听一次吗？他们该说的话已经说完了，目前正在谦卑地等待命运的安排。如果您有什么问题的话，随时都可以问我。”

languages.text: «¿Otra vez? Me temo que ya han dicho todo lo que tenían que decir y esperan humildemente su destino. Si tiene preguntas, puede hacérmelas a mí».
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Otra vez? Me temo que ya han dicho todo lo que tenían que decir y esperan humildemente su destino. Si tiene preguntas, puede hacérmelas a mí».

languages.text: 「またですか？残念ですが、彼らはすでに言うべきことを言い、謙虚に自分の運命を待っています。質問があれば、私にしてください」
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: 「またですか？残念ですが、彼らはすでに言うべきことを言い、謙虚に自分の運命を待っています。質問があれば、私にしてください」

languages.text: "Tekrar mı? Ne yazık ki diyeceklerini söylediler. Alçak gönüllülükle kaderlerini öğrenmeyi bekliyorlar. Sorularınızı bana yöneltebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Again? I'm afraid they have already said what they had to say and are humbly awaiting their fate. Whatever questions you have, you may pose to me."

traits.locale_text: "Tekrar mı? Ne yazık ki diyeceklerini dediler. Alçak gönüllülükle kaderlerini öğrenmeyi bekliyorlar. Sorularınızı bana yöneltebilirsiniz."
